General.Name: Banco Mercantil de Investimentos S.A
General.Description: Banco Mercantil de Investimentos S.A. provides financing services in Brazil. The company offers credit solutions comprising of debentures, notes, FIDC, real estate, and agribusiness receivables certificates; and advisory services for fundraising and structuring debt. Banco Mercantil de Investimentos S.A. was incorporated in 1973 and is based in Belo Horizonte, Brazil. The company operates as a subsidiary of Banco Mercantil do Brasil S.A.
General.Address: Rua Rio de Janeiro, 654, Belo Horizonte, MG, Brazil
